subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
; “wave; undulation”
: Debated.
: {{zh-ref|STEDT}} and {{zh-ref|Starostin}} derive it from {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*r/m-ba||wave; ripple}}. Cognate with {{cog|bo|རྦ}}, {{m|bo|དབའ||wave}}.
: {{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} notes a mismatch of the vowels in the above comparanda, and instead posits a root ''*paj'' (“slanted; not level”), also subsuming {{och-l|陂|slope; slanting|id=1}}.
: {{zh-ref|Wang (1982)}} relates it to {{och-l|播|to winnow}}, {{och-l|簸|to winnow}}.

; “ball; ball game; gearbox; typhoon signal; boob; dance”
: Borrowed from {{bor|zh|en|ball}}.
